scenes.background: Bob sighs and rubs his temples.
scenes.description: 'Why don't we just vote on it and be done?'

options.text: Voting could be a fair way to decide.
options.analysis: You suggested a democratic solution, showing good perception and social skills, but empathy and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: Maybe we need more discussion to reach a consensus.
options.analysis: You opted for further dialogue, showing empathy and self-regulation, but perception and social skill were moderate.

options.text: Voting might not resolve the underlying disagreements. Let's keep exploring options.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the conflict, showing good social skill and motivation, but empathy, perception, and self-regulation were moderate.
